description: Make this classic French nicoise salad recipe with a twist. Our vegetarian version also features pasta which makes it the perfect summer dinner.
keywords: Nicoise salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Healthier Easier,Video,Weeknight dinner,Sesame free,Budget,Potato,Halal,Christmas,Vegetarian,Tomato,Jan Feb 2021,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Nicoise Pasta Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place potatoes in a large saucepan. Cover with water, season with salt, then cover and bring to the boil over high heat. Add pasta and cook according to packet instructions, adding beans for the last 2 minutes of cooking. Drain. Rinse potatoes, pasta and beans under cold water. Drain.
Meanwhile, bring a small saucepan of water to the boil. Add eggs and cook for 6 minutes. Drain and rinse under cold water. When cool enough to handle, peel and halve.
Meanwhile, whisk oil, lemon juice, honey and mustard in a jug. Season.
Quarter potatoes, then arrange on plates with pasta, beans, tomato, olives and egg. Drizzle with dressing and serve scattered with parsley.
